form.official-title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to include a Federal Public or Community Defender as a nonvoting member of the United States Sentencing Commission, and for other purposes.

section.header: Federal defender as a nonvoting member of the United States Sentencing Commission

subsection.text: Section 991(a) of title 28, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the first sentence, by striking one nonvoting member. and inserting 2 nonvoting members.; and

in the fifth sentence, by striking shall be an ex officio, nonvoting member and inserting and a Federal Public or Community Defender designated by the Defender Services Advisory Group, shall be ex officio, nonvoting members of the Commission..

subsection.text: Section 235(b)(5) of the Sentencing Reform Act of 1984 (18 U.S.C. 3551 note) is amended, in the last sentence, by striking nine members, including two ex officio, nonvoting members and inserting 10 members, including 3 ex officio, nonvoting members..
